articles.title: Asian Shares, Nasdaq Futures Fall After Tech Slide: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Wall Street’s selloff in tech heavyweights dragged down global markets on Wednesday, as investors cashed in gains from the leaders of the post-April rally.
articles.content:

articles.title: Spotify’s latest feature lets you add your own transitions to playlists - TechCrunch
